data.feedback: Excellent architecture design that correctly follows existing codebase patterns (HealthService interface pattern, DI registration pattern). All file paths verified - filesToModify exist, filesToCreate don't exist. Stories properly reuse existing SyncNativeStepsUseCase instead of duplicating logic. Acceptance criteria are testable. Minor inconsistency: steps_repository_impl.dart in epic filesToModify but not used in stories - acceptable as it's not needed.

issues.description: Epic filesToModify includes steps_repository_impl.dart but no story modifies it
issues.recommendation: Remove from epic's filesToModify list or clarify why it's there

suggestions: Consider adding error handling guidance for when workmanager fails to register
May want to add a story for unit testing the BackgroundSyncService
